name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is a unique oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box and retro console buttons, this remarkable robot stands out in any crowd. Equipped with soldier-like arms and legs, Retrotron is ready to face any challenge that comes its way. Its screen even features a classic game of Snake, adding a nostalgic touch to its appearance. Retrotron is a true embodiment of the fusion between modern technology and the charm of vintage gaming.
